subject: Implementation of datausage using iptables
commitMessage:
Implementation of datausage using iptables

Adds part of code implementing gathering
network statistics using rules of iptables.

This code periodically gets bytes counters and cgroup numbers
from iptables rules ('iptables-save -t filter -c')
from dedicated chains ( 'RESD_OUTPUT' and 'RESD_INPUT')
and stores values in sqlite3 database.
(/opt/usr/dbspace/.resourced-datausage.db)

Change-Id: I01cb77bd6fd15aa1a6a61c59a2f0ef105516b3ef
Signed-off-by: Przemyslaw Kedzierski <p.kedzierski@samsung.com>
